overview:
Marcus is a co-founder and Head of Platform Architecture at Webjam.

Webjam facilitates an environment for the self-growth of a complex network of people, content, applications and advertising (Social Media).

The default Webjam offering is a B2C intuitive front-end platform for Social Media; which facilitates the aggregation, distribution and customisation of content, modules and applications in the shape of unique websites. This platform will allow users (individuals, communities, companies, organisations) to create, promote and monetise new products and applications. Webjam establishes cross product relations by adding value to all the content/information units (social networking, replication, styling, tagging, rating, commenting and distribution).
